text: The Drew Barrymore Show is a first-run syndicated American talk show hosted by actress Drew Barrymore. The show is distributed by CBS Television Distribution and debuted on September 14, 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2020 American television series debuts Category:2020s American television talk shows Category:American television talk shows Category:Drew Barrymore Category:First-run syndicated television programs in the United States Category:English-language television shows Category:Television series by CBS Television Studios
title: The Drew Barrymore Show
